translations: n．礼仪，礼节：遵循社会规范、习俗和行为规范的行为。
· The students were reminded to maintain decorums during the ceremony.
在仪式期间，学生们被提醒要保持礼仪。

sentences.sentence: When I began teaching in 1962 at the University of California in Berkeley, I asked older colleagues about the decorums and rules of the classroom.
sentences.translation: 当我1962年开始在伯克莱的加州大学任教时，我曾向前辈们请教教室里的礼节和规则。
